SEARCH
Package fi.tuni.olvander.citybicyclejourneys.journeys

Class BicycleJourneyController

java.lang.Object
fi.tuni.olvander.citybicyclejourneys.journeys.BicycleJourneyController
@Controller public class BicycleJourneyController extends Object
A Controller class used to make accessing City Bicycle Journey related
data possible with the help of endpoints and other methods.
Since:
1.21
Version:
2023.12.13
Author:
Olli Pertovaara

  • Field Details

    • stationDb

      @Autowired private StationRepository stationDb
      An instance of the Station repository

    • bicycleJourneyDb

      @Autowired private BicycleJourneyRepository bicycleJourneyDb
      An instance of the Bicycle Journey repository

    • jdbcTemplate

      @Autowired private org.springframework.jdbc.core.JdbcTemplate jdbcTemplate
      A JdbcTemplate instance for interacting with the H2 database.

    • allJourneys

      private Iterable<BicycleJourney> allJourneys
      An Iterable of all current Bicycle Journeys. The size of it
      depends on how many months have been selected in the UI
      and its order varies when the UI columns have been sorted.

    • stations

      private ArrayList<Station> stations
      All Stations in the H2 database. Used with the stationsMap instance
      to get the Station faster from the database than without a HashMap.

    • stationsMap

      private HashMap<String,Station> stationsMap
      A HashMap of types String and Station to get the Station faster.
      The Station id is a String and the Station is the Station object.

  • Constructor Details

    • BicycleJourneyController

      public BicycleJourneyController()
      A default constructor for the BicycleJourneyController class.

  • Method Details

    • getAllJourneysCount

      @RequestMapping(value="api/journeysCount/", method=GET) public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Long> getAllJourneysCount()
      For getting the number of Bicycle Journeys in the database if the UI
      has not yet loaded all the Bicycle Journeys or the number of the
      Iterable allJourneys if the Journeys have been loaded at least once.
      Returns:
      A ResponseEntity with the number of Bicycle Journeys as a Long

    • getJourneys

      @RequestMapping(value="api/journeys/", method=GET) public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Iterable<BicycleJourney>> getJourneys(@RequestParam int[] selectedMonths)
      Returns all the Bicycle Journeys, either all of them
      or a part of them according to the selected months.
      Parameters:
      selectedMonths - The selected months (1 to 3 months selected)
      Returns:
      A Response Entity with all the Bicycle Journeys

    • getJourney

      @RequestMapping(value="api/journeys/{id}/", method=GET) public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<BicycleJourney> getJourney(@PathVariable String id) throws Exception
      Returns a single Bicycle Journey with the id in the URL path.
      Parameters:
      id - The id (a String) of a Bicycle Journey
      Returns:
      Returns a Response Entity with the Bicycle Journey
      Throws:
      Exception - BicycleJourneyNotFoundException / IdNotANumberException

    • getBicycleJourneysWithResponseEntity

      public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Iterable<BicycleJourney>> getBicycleJourneysWithResponseEntity()
      A helper method to get a Response Entity with sorted Bicycle Journeys.
      Returns:
      A Response Entity with Bicycle Journeys

    • getJourneysBetweenDates

      public ArrayList<BicycleJourney> getJourneysBetweenDates(int[] monthsToDisplay)
      A method to get the Bicycle Journeys between dates specified by the
      months to display parameter.
      Parameters:
      monthsToDisplay - 1 to 3 months (int values) selected to display
      Returns:
      An ArrayList with the Bicycle Journeys

    • getDepartureDateRangeForMonthsToDisplay

      public String getDepartureDateRangeForMonthsToDisplay(int[] selectedMonths)
      A helper method for getting a date range.
      The selected months parameter determines the departure dates of the
      Bicycle Journeys so that they must start during the selected month(s).
      Parameters:
      selectedMonths - The selected months
      Returns:
      The Departure dates as a String SQL query

    • sortJourneys

      public void sortJourneys(String sortDirection, String type, int[] monthsToDisplay)

      For sorting Bicycle Journeys with the sort direction
      (either ascending or descending) and with the type
      (either return or departure) and with the
      months to display as the parameters.

      Uses ArrayList sorting and comparing the Station names
      instead of SQL sorting, to make the sorting faster.

      Parameters:
      sortDirection - The direction (String), ascending or descending
      type - The type (a String), either return or departure
      monthsToDisplay - The months to display as int values

    • getAllStations

      public void getAllStations()
      For getting all the Stations.

    • findStationFromMap

      public Optional<Station> findStationFromMap(String stationId)
      For finding a Station from the Station HashMap in order
      to hasten the sorting of the Bicycle Journeys.
      Parameters:
      stationId - The Station id (not the true id) of the Station
      Returns:
      An Optional Station to be returned

    • addStationsToHashMap

      public void addStationsToHashMap()
      For adding Stations to the Station Hash Map in order
      to hasten the sorting of the Bicycle Journeys.

    • getJourneysSortedByDepartureStationDesc

      @RequestMapping(value="api/journeys/departureDesc/", method=GET) public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Iterable<BicycleJourney>> getJourneysSortedByDepartureStationDesc(@RequestParam int[] selectedMonths)
      For getting Bicycle Journeys sorted descending by departure Station.
      Parameters:
      selectedMonths - The selected months as int values
      Returns:
      A Response Entity with sorted Bicycle Journeys

    • getJourneysSortedByDepartureStationAsc

      @RequestMapping(value="api/journeys/departureAsc/", method=GET) public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Iterable<BicycleJourney>> getJourneysSortedByDepartureStationAsc(@RequestParam int[] selectedMonths)
      For getting Bicycle Journeys sorted ascending by departure Station.
      Parameters:
      selectedMonths - The selected months as int values
      Returns:
      A Response Entity with sorted Bicycle Journeys

    • getJourneysSortedByReturnStationDesc

      @RequestMapping(value="api/journeys/returnDesc/", method=GET) public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Iterable<BicycleJourney>> getJourneysSortedByReturnStationDesc(@RequestParam int[] selectedMonths)
      For getting Bicycle Journeys sorted descending by return Station.
      Parameters:
      selectedMonths - The selected months as int values
      Returns:
      A Response Entity with sorted Bicycle Journeys

    • getJourneysSortedByReturnStationAsc

      @RequestMapping(value="api/journeys/returnAsc/", method=GET) public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Iterable<BicycleJourney>> getJourneysSortedByReturnStationAsc(@RequestParam int[] selectedMonths)
      For getting Bicycle Journeys sorted ascending by return Station
      Parameters:
      selectedMonths - The selected months as int values
      Returns:
      A Response Entity with sorted Bicycle Journeys

    • getJourneysSortedByDistanceDesc

      @RequestMapping(value="api/journeys/distanceDesc/", method=GET) public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Iterable<BicycleJourney>> getJourneysSortedByDistanceDesc(@RequestParam int[] selectedMonths)
      For getting Bicycle Journeys sorted descending by distance.
      Parameters:
      selectedMonths - The selected months as int values
      Returns:
      A Response Entity with sorted Bicycle Journeys

    • getJourneysSortedByDistanceAsc

      @RequestMapping(value="api/journeys/distanceAsc/", method=GET) public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Iterable<BicycleJourney>> getJourneysSortedByDistanceAsc(@RequestParam int[] selectedMonths)
      For getting Bicycle Journeys sorted ascending by Journey distance.
      Parameters:
      selectedMonths - The selected months as int values
      Returns:
      A Response Entity with sorted Bicycle Journeys

    • getJourneysSortedByDurationDesc

      For getting Bicycle Journeys sorted descending by Journey duration.
      Parameters:
      selectedMonths - The selected months as int values

      A Response Entity with sorted Bicycle Journeys

    • getJourneysSortedByDurationAsc

      @RequestMapping(value="api/journeys/durationAsc/", method=GET) public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Iterable<BicycleJourney>> getJourneysSortedByDurationAsc(@RequestParam int[] selectedMonths)
      For getting Bicycle Journeys sorted ascending by Journey duration.
      Parameters:

      A Response Entity with sorted Bicycle Journeys

    • getLocalDateTime

      public LocalDateTime getLocalDateTime(String dateTime)
      A helper method. Returns a LocalDateTime object from given dateTime
      String. The LocalDateTime object is set with a default value "00:00"
      if the dateTime String has no time, meaning it started at midnight.
      Parameters:
      dateTime - A dateTime String having the date
      Returns:
      A LocalDateTime object
